T02D1767:263b-1: re ma ti'i dmag zor gyi man ngag 'di la /
T02D1767:263b-2: man ngang gcig la khungs gnyis te /
T02D1767:263b-3: dang po a'a tsarya dmar po la lce 'byung gnas bzang pos gser srang lnga phul nas zhus /
T02D1767:263b-4: dge bshes lce la zhang shes rab dang /
T02D1767:263b-5: snubs rgya le gnyis kyis stag gcig spyi mar phul nas zhus //
T02D1767:263b-6: snubs la snubs kyi ma mo khrag mig ces par grags so //
T02D1767:263b-7: gnyis pa ni lo ts'a ba shes rab bla mas
T02D1767:263b-8: gu ru a'a tsar+ya dmar po nyid rgya gar du
T02D1767:263b-9: gshegs pa la bal po tshun chad skyel thung mdzad
T02D1767:263b-10: nas zhus nas khyad byung ste /
T02D1767:263b-11: zhal gyi man ngag ma lus pa yid ches par gnang ste khungs gnyis so //
T02D1767:263b-12: dmag zor zhes pa'i des tshig gtam der rtsad chod do //
T02D1767:263b-13: gzhung ni sdom brgyad po 'di nyid yin te khungs mthun no //
T02D1767:263b-15: mchod pa bshams te bca' ba dang //
T02D1767:263b-16: ma mo bskyed cing ye shes dgug / mchod cing bzlas pa bya ba dang //
T02D1767:263b-17: bstod cing las sbyor bsdu ba'o //
T02D1767:263b-18: de la mchod pa bsham pa ni //
T02D1767:263b-19: dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i sar //
T02D1767:263b-21: mdun du gru gsum mi ris bcas //
T02D1767:263b-22: mandala steng du sogs pa'i rdzas //
T02D1767:263b-23: phud dang gtor ma rakta bshams //
T02D1767:263b-24: khram shing byang dmar nad rkyal dang //
T02D1767:263b-25: sho rde'u tshon gyi dru bu sogs //
T02D1767:263b-26: sha sna rnyed tshad mi dbang sha / bsur chen ma mo mnyes par bya //
T02D1767:263b-27: de nas rten gyi bya thabs ni /
T02D1767:263b-28: dkyil 'khor dbang ldan mtshams su ni //
T02D1767:263b-30: dre'u rta la zhon nag mo ni //
T02D1767:263b-31: mthing nag rgyan gyis brgyan pa mo //
T02D1767:263b-32: rma bya'i gdugs kyis phub pa ste //
T02D1767:263b-33: bdud phrug mtshon thogs mang pos bskor //
T02D1767:263b-34: 'jigs su rung bas bskor bar bya //
T02D1767:263b-35: da ni ma mo bskyed par bya //
T02D1767:263b-36: rang gi cho ga rdzogs byas la //
T02D1767:263b-37: byang shar mu le dngos su bsam //
T02D1767:263b-38: rlung nag 'tshub ma'i nang shed du //
T02D1767:263b-39: ksha zhes brjod pas skad cig gis //
T02D1767:263b-40: dmag zor nag mo re ma ti //
T02D1767:263b-41: dre'u rta la zhon thod pa can //
T02D1767:263b-42: phyag g-yas be con 'dzin pa la //
T02D1767:264a-2: dmod mo'i mtshon cha lnga dang bcas //
T02D1767:264a-3: sga ya snga sha nad rkyal la //
T02D1767:264a-4: sga yi phyi ru dru bu ste //
T02D1767:264a-5: khram shing rked la gzir ba dang //
T02D1767:264a-6: byad dmar sho rde'u snga sha la //
T02D1767:264a-7: dar nag gos kyis sku stod brgyan //
T02D1767:264a-8: bya yi gdugs 'og chud par bsam //
T02D1767:264a-9: bdud phrug tshogs ni dus mnyam du //
T02D1767:264a-10: g-yon pa thod khrag yungs kar can //
T02D1767:264a-11: g-yas pa mtshon cha sna tshogs can //
T02D1767:264a-12: de ltar dam tshig bskyed byas la //
T02D1767:264a-13: rang bzhin gnas nas gzhug par bya //
T02D1767:264a-14: dza:h'um zhes ni sngags la gdags //
T02D1767:264a-15: byang shar nas byon rang rang thim //
T02D1767:264a-16: bzhugs su gsol ba'i tshig 'di brjod //
T02D1767:264a-17: h'um nag mo gdug can dregs pa can //
T02D1767:264a-18: kun du khyab pa'i gzugs ston ma //
T02D1767:264a-19: nag mo gtso mo dre'u rta chibs //
T02D1767:264a-20: 'dir spyon dre'u rta'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D1767:264a-21: ragmo dza:h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod do //
T02D1767:264a-22: de nas de la mchod par bya //
T02D1767:264a-23: za byed nag mo mche ba can //
T02D1767:264a-24: dgod byed ha ha nag mo khyod //
T02D1767:264a-25: gsod la dga' bar byed pa mo //
T02D1767:264a-26: bdag ni brda yi phyag byed do //
T02D1767:264a-27: ragmo aa ti p'u dza ho //
T02D1767:264a-28: pra mo sbom po las byung ba'i //
T02D1767:264a-29: bdud rtsi bran pa'i dza gad 'di /
T02D1767:264a-30: dmag zor nag mo la 'bul lags //
T02D1767:264a-31: bstan pa bsrung phyir bzhes su gsol//
T02D1767:264a-32: yi ge sum cu gcig pa la //
T02D1767:264a-33: panytsa aa mri ta kh'a hi gdags so //
T02D1767:264a-34: sha khrag la sogs bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyor //
T02D1767:264a-35: 'bru sna lnga la sbyar ba'i gtor ma 'di //
T02D1767:264a-36: dmag gzor nag mo khyod la dbul //
T02D1767:264a-37: bstan pa bsrung phyir bzhes su gsol //
T02D1767:264a-38: sngags kyi mjug la ba lim ta la kha ram kh'a hi zhes gdags so //
T02D1767:264a-39: chu dang ma 'dres dangs ma'i khrag / dngas ma yi ni khrag chen po //
T02D1767:264a-40: dmag zor nag mo la dbul lags //
T02D1767:264a-41: bstan pa bsrung phyir bzhes su gsol //
T02D1767:264a-42: sngags kyi mjug la ma h'a rakta kha ram kh'a hi zhes so //
T02D1767:264a-43: lha mo'i sdog mi yong bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1767:264a-44: byang chub kyi sems dkar dmar lce la bzhag cing mchod do //
T02D1767:264a-46: de nas smon lam gdab pa ni //
T02D1767:264a-47: bdag cag dus 'dir tshe ring zhing //
T02D1767:264a-48: bu dang tsha bo rgyas pa dang //
T02D1767:264a-49: longs spyod thams cad rgyas pa dang //
T02D1767:264a-50: log par lta ba'i dgra dang bgegs //
T02D1767:264b-0: thams cad rtag tu rlog par @264b byed //
T02D1767:264b-1: da ni bzlas pa brtsam par bya //
T02D1767:264b-2: rten gyi lha mo'i thugs ka ru //
T02D1767:264b-3: rgyus pa'i sred bu de la gdags //
T02D1767:264b-4: rnal 'byor snying ga'i sa bon las //
T02D1767:264b-6: lha mo'i thugs kar ma la thim //
T02D1767:264b-7: 'od zer sngags kyis mchod par bsam //
T02D1767:264b-8: 'od zer dkar po sngags kyi gzugs //
T02D1767:264b-9: bdag la slar thim dngos grub byin //
T02D1767:264b-10: de ltar yang dang yang du bsam //
T02D1767:264b-11: de yi thun smad dag la ni //
T02D1767:264b-12: bdag dang ma mo bdud phrug bcas //
T02D1767:264b-13: thams cad dus mnyam sngags zlos pa'i //
T02D1767:264b-15: 'brub khung yungs thun khrag thun bya ;
T02D1767:264b-16: / gzas pa'i lus kyang brlag par bsam //
T02D1767:264b-17: mgon po de la gzungs thag gtang //
T02D1767:264b-18: bstod pa cung zad cung zad bya //
T02D1767:264b-19: re ma ti yi spyi dang mthun //
T02D1767:264b-20: de nas las la bsdu ba ni //
T02D1767:264b-21: bdud phrug tshogs dang khrag rnams ni //
T02D1767:264b-22: sle'u khung du khyer nas ni //
T02D1767:264b-23: bsgrub bya'i phyogs su kha bltas la //
T02D1767:264b-24: skra bcings 'gram pa sol bas byug / dpung pa g-yas pa phyung nas su //
T02D1767:264b-26: yang na lag pa rang gis te //
T02D1767:264b-27: zor lam spyi dang mthun par dbye //
T02D1767:264b-28: dmag gi tshogs ni mi thub sbyin //
T02D1767:264b-29: dug lngas bkang ba mang po dang //
T02D1767:264b-30: yungs thun thogs pa mang po dang //
T02D1767:264b-31: mtshon cha thogs pa mang po yis //
T02D1767:264b-32: dgra lus yul 'khor bcom pa dang //
T02D1767:264b-33: thams cad gsod cing za bar bsam //
T02D1767:264b-34: g-yang gzhi drag tu brdab par bya //
T02D1767:264b-35: log la lha mo la yang mchod //
T02D1767:264b-36: bdud phung mang po phangs pa'i tshe //
T02D1767:264b-37: bdud phrugs gzugs rnams mi snang na //
T02D1767:264b-38: las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za //
T02D1767:264b-39: bdud rnams 'dug na cung zad dka' //
T02D1767:264b-40: cung zad bstod pa byed pa ni //
T02D1767:264b-41: h'um bhyo dpal gyi gzugs can 'dod khams gtso mo khyod //
T02D1767:264b-42: rta mchog zhon nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar rgyug / be con thod pa dam pa rang rtags 'dzin//
T02D1767:264b-43: re ldes stod dkris sbrul gyi sham bu can //
T02D1767:264b-44: lte bar nyi shar gtsug na zla rgyas ma //
T02D1767:264b-45: khrag nad bdag mo dbyings phyug dpal 'bar ma //
T02D1767:264b-46: lha mo re ma ti la bstod pa 'bul //
T02D1767:264b-50: kha la rag che na ma /
T02D1767:264b-51: ragmo aa bya ta bya thun bhyo: //
T02D1767:265a-2: che ge mo m'a ra ya /
T02D1767:265a-3: 'bod rbad bsad gsum de la tshang //
T02D1767:265a-4: bzlas pa la ni brtson 'grus bya //
T02D1767:265a-5: ma mo'i bstod bskul spyi dang mthun //
T02D1767:265a-6: gser mkhar rab tu dus bzhi'i rgyal mo'i bskul la sogs pa bya //
T02D1767:265a-7: dpal lha mo dmag zor gyi man ngag rdzogs so /
